knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
df <- read.csv('./HousePrices.csv',header=T)
dim(df)
str(df)
summary(df)
barplot(table(df$MSSubClass))

```
# 결측치 찾기
```{r}
#install.packages('VIM')
library(VIM)
aggr(df, numbers=T,prop=F)
```

# 주거유형에 따른 집값 평균
```{r}
table(df$BldgType)
BldgType_aggr <- aggregate(df$SalePrice,
                          by=list( BldgType = df$BldgType),
                            FUN = mean,
                            na.rm = TRUE)
BldgType_aggr
```
